products.name: Syltherine
products.description: A modern and stylish cafe chair crafted with premium materials, perfect for enhancing your dining or cafe space with elegance and comfort while ensuring durability and timeless design.

products.name: Leviosa
products.description: Leviosa adds a contemporary touch to any room. Its ergonomic design and superior materials deliver exceptional comfort and style for cafes, dining spaces, or cozy home interiors.

products.name: Lolito
products.description: Lolito luxury sofa combines comfort and sophistication. With ample seating space, soft cushions, and a chic design, it's the ideal statement piece for modern living rooms.

products.name: Respira
products.description: Respira outdoor bar set features a compact and durable design. It's weather-resistant, stylish, and ideal for relaxing moments on your patio, balcony, or garden spaces.
